context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: consult with the doctor or pharmacist about possible alternatives or generic versions of the medication which can be less expensive
explore all possible financial resources and options available, including but not limited to:
explore different strategies to address this problem
seek financial assistance
reach out to the drug manufacturer or a patient assistance program
seek assistance from different sources
explore every possible avenue for financial assistance
explore all the possible options he has
explore all possible options

explore different avenues like reaching out to nonprofits that assist with medical expenses, consulting with the doctors for cheaper medication alternatives, setting up a crowdfunding campaign, or inquiring about a payment plan with the pharmacy

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber or another ride share service to get him to the airport while his car is being handled by the roadside assistance or tow truck
call a cab, an Uber, or any other transport service to get to the airport in time
call for a taxi, Uber, or other car service as soon as possible
call for a taxi, an Uber or any other form of public transportation that can get him to the airport quickly
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride-sharing service to transport him to the airport
call a taxi service or ride-share service such as Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to take him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other car service to get him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or another ride service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the sales receipts and compare them with the cash in the register

check the surveillance cameras if any, review the transactions made during his shift, verify each transaction receipt, check if the register has any unnoticed cash or if he mistakenly gave more change to any customer
immediately report the missing money to his boss or the owner
immediately report the shortfall to his supervisor
immediately inform the bakery owner or his immediate supervisor about the missing money and also try to recall and review any unusual or suspicious transactions or customers throughout the day
check any security footage that might show what happened to the money
immediately report the discrepancy to his superior or the owner of the bakery and work together to investigate the issue
check the security camera footage if possible to see if there was any theft or error at the register
check the sales receipts and transactions to verify if there were any mistakes or miscounts
report the missing money to his superior immediately

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary should do is to
generation: explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to be able to submit the assignment later
immediately contact her teacher either in person or via email, if possible
explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for an extension to submit the homework
explain the situation to her teacher, apologise for the missing assignment, and request for an extension to submit the work
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could turn it in the next day when her mom can bring back the homework assignment
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension or opportunity to bring the assignment the next day
immediately contact her teacher and explain the situation
explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for an opportunity to turn in the homework a bit later or email/discuss the homework assignment if possible
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit it
email her teacher explaining the situation and ask for an extension

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay in one place
stay put and try to make his location as visible as possible for aerial or distant searchers
stay put and not wander off
stay calm and try to keep everyone else calm
stay put
stay where they are and try to create a visible signal for rescuers, such as a smoke signal, large SOS sign on the ground or reflective material
try to find a way to signal for help, such as creating a signal fire or any other visible distress signs
stay together with his group, find a safe and sheltered spot to camp or seek for shelter, build a fire for warmth, and ration the remaining food and water
find a protected spot to set up a temporary shelter
stay put and create a shelter
